name: tua_phidu_2015_lga_aust_risk_factors_adults_2014_15
title: LGA15 Adults Health Risk Factor Estimates - 2014-2015

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Australia (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 AU)

keyword: adult,tua,smoking,torrens university australia,phidu,weight,public health information development unit,health risk factors adults,blood pressure,health risks,alcohol,psychological distress,excercise,fruit intake
abstract:
Estimated number of males/females/people aged 18 years and over whose health was at risk in one of the following categories: psychologically distressed, blood pressure, overweight, obesity, waist measurement, smoking, alcohol consumption, fruit consumption and no or low exercise, 2014-15 (all entries that were classified as not shown, not published or not applicable were assigned a null value; no data was provided for Maralinga Tjarutja LGA, in South Australia). The data is by LGA 2015 profile (based on the LGA 2011 geographic boundaries). For more information on statistics used please refer to the PHIDU website, available from: http://phidu.torrens.edu.au/.
Source: Estimates for Population Health Areas (PHAs) are modelled estimates and were produced by the ABS; estimates at the LGA and PHN level were derived from the PHA estimates.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_code
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Code
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area Code (2011).

selectedAttributes.name: lga_name
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Name
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area Name (2011).

selectedAttributes.name: lw_excse_1_count
selectedAttributes.title: Estimated number of people who did low or no exercise ? count
selectedAttributes.description: The estimated number of people aged 18 years and over did low (score less than 800) or no exercise in the week prior to the survey, exercise was calculated by duration (minutes) X intensity factor (walking for fitness = 3.5, moderate = 5, vigorous = 7.5), 2014-15 ? count.

selectedAttributes.name: lw_excse_5_sr
selectedAttributes.title: Estimated number of people who did low or no exercise ? SR
selectedAttributes.description: The estimated number of people aged 18 years and over did low (score less than 800) or no exercise in the week prior to the survey, exercise was calculated by duration (minutes) X intensity factor (walking for fitness = 3.5, moderate = 5, vigorous = 7.5), 2014-15 ? indirectly age-standardised ratio (This ratio is the observed number to expected number of occurrences in the LGA given the relevant Australian standard population).
